page.title: 10RESIDENTIAL CHELFORD gen.
page.content: We gathered these facts about local development from two men, one working for a local estate agent and the other with a general knowledge of the area. Many people are moving into the area from the Manchester suburbs as their offices are moving out of the city centre and they have not got as far to travel. Properties have increased greatly in value. It is old rather than new properties which are on the market. Chelford is an expensive area to buy property. The Seddon Estate is being extended at the moment near Peck Mill Farm. There are two drawbacks to further expansion _ this is a Green-Belt area and no high buildings are allowed near Jodrell Bank.
